verbose_text: However, a more recent study has indicated that the allosteric activator A769662 activates the alpha1beta1gamma1 complex independent of alpha-Thr 174 phosphorylation under conditions where Ser 108 of the beta-subunit is phosphorylated [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: alpha1beta1gamma1 complex independent of alpha-Thr 174  phosphorylation under conditions where Ser 108  of the beta-subunit is phosphorylated
